channel.title: Npc command
channel.description: ok hey i cant get the server code right to let me use ::npc and spawn one i know its simple but i just need someone to gimmy the code to add, ive done it b4 but i cant get it right

item.title: Npc command
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ty
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 05:27:11 pm[/size][hr]i got this error and i changes the sM to sendMessage because im on a non-delta server

client.java:4360: cannot find symbol symbol : method spawnANPC(int,int,int,int) location: class NPCHandler server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Npc command
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); sM("You spawn an npc"); } else { sM("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); }}

Read full topic
